message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe we can come to a fair price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I need to get a bit closer to my target price. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to meet you at $11,500. I'm willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
